1.0.0.name: wordpress/one-click-logout-barless
1.0.0.description:
If you remove the gray admin bar using the Admin Bar Removal plugin by sLa --- a new header and logout link is created by that plugin. One Click Logout Barless works in conjunction with it, most specifically to restore a WP 3.2-like Dashboard header with one-click logout.

Originally, this plugin was a patch for the initial versions of the Admin Bar Removal plugin, and provided logout capabilities lost when the gray admin bar was removed, specifically it restored a WP 3.2-like header and a one-click logout. The current version of the Admin Bar Removal plugin now has logout capabilities! but the header is less than stylish. As such, the latest version of the plugin here, removes the header and replaces it with the more stylish 3.2 header and logout -- in the eyes of some, a prettier barless Dashboard!

Includes multisite support
